generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and directional arrows, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways visible along the edges of the road, separated by curbs or poles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the image, including a brown brick building on the left and a modern glass-fronted building on the right.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, with one showing green for the direction of the camera.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing left is visible on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background, particularly on the left side of the image.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing overcast.
- person: Pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the background.
- rider: A person riding a motorcycle is visible on the left side of the image.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible in the center of the image, driving away from the camera.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the left side of the image, being ridden by a person.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the left side of the image, parked on the sidewalk.
